sourcesContent:
<template lang="html">
  <v-container>
    <v-form  @submit.prevent="onSubmit">
      <v-card class="px-4" v-if="!scenario">
        <v-row align="center">
          <v-col
          :cols="8">
            <v-select
                v-if="!editThemeName"
                :items="themes"
                item-text="name"
                return-object
                v-model="selectedTheme"
                label="Theme Name"
                outlined dense hide-details>
                <template v-slot:append-outer v-if="canEdit" style="margin-top: 0px">
                  <v-icon
                    v-if="!editThemeName"
                    color="green" icon
                    @click="editThemeName = !editThemeName">mdi-pencil-circle</v-icon>
                </template>
            </v-select>
            <v-text-field
              v-else
              label="Theme Name"
              :value="selectedTheme.name"
              @change="newThemeName = $event"
              dense outlined
              hide-details>
              <template v-slot:append-outer v-if="canEdit">
                <v-icon
                  v-if="editThemeName"
                  color="green" icon
                  @click="updateThemeName()">mdi-check-circle</v-icon>
              </template>
            </v-text-field>
          </v-col>
          <v-col
          :cols="3">
            <v-switch
              v-if="selectedTheme.id && canEdit"
              v-model="activeSwitch"
              label="Active Theme"/>
          </v-col>

          <v-col
          :cols="1">
            <AddTheme
              :userID="user.id"
              @add-theme="addTheme($event)"/>
          </v-col>
        </v-row>
      </v-card>
      <v-divider class="mt-6 mb-2" v-if="(selectedTheme.id && !scenario)"/>
      <v-row v-if="!scenario">
        <v-col :cols="4">
          <v-card
            @click="active='setup'">
            <v-card-title  class="justify-center">
              Document Preferences
            </v-card-title>
          </v-card>
        </v-col>
        <v-col :cols="4">
          <v-card
            @click="active='builder'">
            <v-card-title  class="justify-center">
              Table Builder
            </v-card-title>
          </v-card>
        </v-col>
        <v-col :cols="4">
          <v-card
            @click="active='styler'">
            <v-card-title  class="justify-center">
              Theme Styler
            </v-card-title>
          </v-card>
        </v-col>
      </v-row>
      <v-divider class="mt-3 mb-3" v-if="selectedTheme.id && !scenario"/>
      <v-row v-if="themes">
        <v-col>
          <ThemeStyler
            v-if="active=='styler'"
            :theme="selectedTheme"
            :canEdit="false"
          />
          <ThemeBuilder
            v-if="active=='builder'"
            :theme="selectedTheme"
            :canEdit="false"
          />
          <ThemeSetup
            v-if="active=='setup'"
            :theme="selectedTheme"
            :canEdit="canEdit"
          />
        </v-col>
      </v-row>
    </v-form>
  </v-container>
</template>

<script>
import { apiService } from "@/common/api.service.js";
import AddTheme from "@/components/AddTheme.vue";
import WithoutWatchers from "@/components/mixins/WithoutWatchers.js";
import ThemeStyler from "@/components/ThemeStyler.vue";
import ThemeBuilder from "@/components/ThemeBuilder.vue";
import ThemeSetup from "@/components/ThemeSetup.vue";

export default {
  name: "ThemeTable",
  mixins: [WithoutWatchers],
  props: {
    user: {
      type: Object,
      required: true,
    },
    scenario: {
      type: Object,
      required: false,
    },
  },
  data() {
    return {
      activeSwitch: false,
      error: null,
      editThemeName: false,
      selectedTheme: {},
      newThemeName: '',
      themes: null,
      active: 'setup',
    };
  },
  components: {
    AddTheme,
    ThemeStyler,
    ThemeBuilder,
    ThemeSetup,
  },
  computed: {
    canEdit() {
      if (this.isPracticeAdmin && this.isNotAFSLLimited ) {
        return true
      } else {
        return false
      }
    },
    isPracticeAdmin() {
      if (this.themes && this.selectedTheme.id) {
        if (this.selectedTheme.active_practices.length > 0) {
          return this.selectedTheme.active_practices.some(item => this.user.admin_practices.includes(item));
        } else {
          return true
        }
      } else {
        return true
      }
    },
    isNotAFSLLimited() {
      if (this.themes && this.selectedTheme) {
        if (this.selectedTheme.AFSL_limitation) {
          return this.selectedTheme.AFSL_limitation.length < 1
        } else {
          return false
        }
      } else {
        return false
      }
    },
    selectedIsActive() {
      if (this.selectedTheme.id === this.user.active_theme) {
        return true;
      } else {
        return false;
      }
    },
    scenarioTheme(){
      if (this.scenario) {
        return this.scenario.theme;
      } else {
        return null;
      }
    }
  },
  watch: {
    selectedTheme: function () {
      this.setActiveSwitch()
    },
    activeSwitch: function () {
      this.setActiveTheme()
    },
    scenarioTheme: function() {
      this.setSelectedTheme();
    }
  },
  methods: {
    setActiveSwitch() {
      this.$withoutWatchers(() => {
        if (this.selectedIsActive) {
          this.activeSwitch = true;
        } else {
          this.activeSwitch = false;
        }
      })
    },
    getThemeIndex(theme) {
      return this.themes.findIndex(item => item.id === theme.id);
    },
    updateThemeName() {
      this.updateTheme('name', this.newThemeName)
      this.editThemeName = !this.editThemeName
      this.newThemeName = null;
    },
    updateTheme(prop,value) {
      if (value) {
        let endpoint = `/api/themes/${this.selectedTheme.id}/`;
        apiService(endpoint, "PATCH", {
          [prop]: value,
        }).then(data => {
          this.selectedTheme[prop] = data[prop];
          this.themes[this.getThemeIndex(data)] = data;
          this.$emit('update-active-theme', data)
        });
      }
    },
    setActiveTheme() {
      let setActive = null;
      if (this.activeSwitch) {
        setActive = this.selectedTheme.id;
      }
      let endpoint = `/api/user/${this.user.id}/`;
      apiService(endpoint, "PATCH", {
        active_theme: setActive,
      }).then(data => {
        this.$emit('update-user',data);
      });

    },
    addTheme(data) {
      this.themes.push(data);
      this.selectedTheme = data;
    },
    getThemeData() {
      let endpoint = `/api/themes/`;
      apiService(endpoint).then(data => {
        this.themes = data.results;
        this.setSelectedTheme();
        this.$emit('load-themes', data.results);
      });
    },
    setSelectedTheme() {
      if (this.scenario) {
        this.selectedTheme = this.themes.find(e => e.id === this.scenarioTheme);
      } else if (this.user.active_theme && this.themes){
        this.selectedTheme = this.themes.find(e => e.id === this.user.active_theme);
      }
    },
  },
  mounted() {
    this.getThemeData();
    this.setActiveSwitch()
  }
};
</script>
